attributes.action: change the qualification for MP's to only those who have actualy worked for a living.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be more representative of the general public if all members of parliament had actualy worked for a given period prior to standing. This would give them an insight into the real world. Only those who have served in the forces/emergency services for 5 years. Other occupations 10 years. There is no sustitute for hands on experience in the troubles that our governments expect the work force to cope with. Having been at the sharp end may make them think twice before committing.
